title: The White Gorilla
text: The White Gorilla is a 1945 American film directed by <a href="Harry%20L.%20Fraser">Harry L. Fraser</a> and starring <a href="Ray%20Corrigan">Ray Corrigan</a>, <a href="Lorraine%20Miller">Lorraine Miller</a>, and <a href="Clyde%20Beatty">Clyde Beatty</a>. The film was made by re-editing the 1927 silent film "<a href="Perils%20of%20the%20Jungle%20%281927%20film%29">Perils of the Jungle</a>", and adding new footage as a framing plot. This was done without regard to differences in film quality or speed.
